properties.description: A place where all are welcome. Support, Fun. Great people and great community. Where people make a differance.
properties.title: Daily Bread Community Cafe

properties.description: Community space heart of the community accessible to all. Toddler groups, youth groups, craft group, knit and crochet group, pantry for food items, tea and coffee and lunches too!
properties.title: Heart on the terrace

properties.address: 31 Church Street, Seaham, County Durham SR7 7HQ
properties.description: We welcome all in our space. Safe Harbour Seaham is Community of Hope and are linked with our local churches. We are a community hub who welcomes everyone and works holistically with the individual; we can help with food and energy vouchers as well as provide a listening ear and somewhere for a good chat.
properties.title: Safe Harbour Seaham
